messages.subject: thanks
messages.msgSnippet: What?? I just signed up for unschooling BASICS, LOL. I want my money back! Now, now...we can draw this out for a very long time if you like, make you feel
messages.messageBody:
"What?? I just signed up for unschooling BASICS, LOL. I want my money
back!"

Now, now...we can draw this out for a very long time if you like,

Ren

messages.subject: Re: thanks
messages.msgSnippet: ... Just did. I think I need to frame it... ... What?? I just signed up for unschooling BASICS, LOL. I want my money back! --aj
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Ren Allen"
<starsuncloud@n...> wrote:
> Have you read Sandra Dodd's "Certificate of Empowerment"?

Just did. I think I need to frame it...
>
> Look out! You're turning into a radical.:)

What?? I just signed up for unschooling BASICS, LOL. I want my money
back!

--aj

messages.subject: thanks
messages.msgSnippet: We re going to try bringing the kids into the kitchen/dining room and cooking together while they start eating. I love it! I enjoyed your whole post...when
messages.messageBody:
"We're going to try bringing the
kids into the kitchen/dining room and cooking together while they
start eating."

I love it!
I enjoyed your whole post...when joy becomes the focus and emotional
health the priority, it takes away all those "shoulds" and "have
to's". We start to question everything.

Have you read Sandra Dodd's "Certificate of Empowerment"?

Look out! You're turning into a radical.:)

Ren
